news.title: Amazon asks corporate workers to ‘volunteer’ help with grocery deliveries as Prime Day frenzy approaches
news.summary: Office workers in New York requested to donate time over to Fresh delivery process during firm’s busiest time. It is not clear how many took up the offer.

news.title: How terrorist groups are leveraging AI to recruit and finance their operations
news.summary: Counter-terrorism agencies are scrambling to maintain an advantage and thwart attacks as access to digital tools eases. Jihadist terrorist groups have leveraged digital tools to recruit, covertly finance via crypto, download weapons for 3D printing and spread tradecraft.
